title: Vase, ca. 1820
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Talbot Jones Taylor
description: Square in plan, with flaring tops and rolled edges. Supported by four winged paws of gilt bronze, on square pedestal. Painted in colours, with classical landscapes and figures in costume of classical antiquity.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Tole, gilt bronze, paint. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Talbot Jones Taylor. 1912-18-7-b.
